value.name: Well-known Visalia recycling plant facing $1.7 million in fines
value.description: ADOLFO RAMIREZ: We find ourselves today with a pretty big problem on our hands. -Cal Recycle, the state agency that regulates recycling, is investigating BC for program violations, which have amounted to $1.7 million in fines. According to Cal Recycle ...
